# DATA EXPLORATION

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(xts)
library(forecast)
```

```{r}
df<-read.csv("df.csv")
```

```{r}
View(df)
```

```{r}
df |> 
  mutate(data = as.Date(data, format = "%Y-%m-%d")) -> 
  df
```

```{r}
y <- xts(df$totale_R001, df$data)
```

```{r}
plot(y["2018-09-01/22024-05-08"])
```


- a marzon del 2020 non ci sono vendite dovuto al lockdown

```{r}
plot(y["2020-04-01/2024-05-08"])
```

# TEST DI STAZIONARIETA

....


# STAZIONARIZZAZIONE

```{r}
ly<-log(y["2020-04-01/2024-05-08"]+1)
plot(ly)
```


```{r}
dly<-diff(ly)
plot(dly)
```

# MODELLO

```{r}
Acf(y["2020-04-01/2024-05-08"], 366)
Pacf(y["2020-04-01/2024-05-08"], 366)
```

```{r}
Acf(dly, 366)
Pacf(dly, 366)
```
